snippet: Fellow conservatives believe Gov. Mike Pence will sign a measure making the state the second to ban abortion of fetuses with a genetic abnormality.
abstract: Indiana Gov Mike Pence, by publicly stressing his anti-abortion convictions, leads fellow conservatives to believe he is likely to sign measure banning abortion in cases in which fetus has genetic abnormality; bill would make Indiana second state in nation to implement such ban.
lead_paragraph: Fellow conservatives believe Gov. Mike Pence will sign a measure making the state the second to ban abortion of fetuses with a genetic abnormality.

headline.main: Indiana: Bill Banning Abortions for Genetic Causes Goes to Governor
headline.print_headline: Indiana: Bill Banning Abortions for Genetic Causes Goes to Governor
